Title: nAcl - .NET Access Control List
Description: nAcl helps you handle scenarios for a matrix of rights easily. It can also be easily extended through a provider (as many of ASP.NET functionalities)
HomeWiki:
Project Description

nAcl helps you handle scenarios for a matrix of rights easily. It can also be easily extended through a provider (as many of ASP.NET functionalities)

Features

  • Handles the rights of an application for you
  • Handles a hierarchy of rights
  • Rights are calculated in one place but can be potentially retrieved from anywhere thanks to the provider mechanism
  • In memory provider for static rights
  • Router provider to handle routes and associating providers to a route
  • Sql provider to handle rights in Db

People behind nAcl



nAcl is a project managed by Evaluant and is part of its R&D developments
